oai_dc:dc.dc:title: First record of the invasive Nile Tilapia, Oreochromis niloticus (Linnaeus, 1758) (Perciformes, Cichlidae), on Bawean Island, Indonesia
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: Hasan, Veryl
Tamam, Muhammad Badrut
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Oreochromis niloticus
Indonesia
invasion biology
invasive species
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: <jats:p>In 2018 we captured specimens of <jats:italic>Oreachromis niloticus</jats:italic> (Linnaeus, 1758) from Danau Kastoba, a crater lake on Bawean (Indonesia), a small, isolated island in the Java Sea. Additional individuals were later photographed. These records are among first of this species from an isolated island, in the Java Sea. A description of meristic and morphometric features of a specimen are provided.</jats:p>
